prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Staying informed about technological advancements and identifying the most relevant innovations can be challenging due to the constant influx of information and rapid pace of change.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Technological advancements, innovations, information influx, rapid change, staying informed
